title: Diamond 3/4 ADC main looking for competitive team
body:
IGN: Ryuku
Rank: Hovering D3/D4
Role(s): ADC
Age: 16 
Favourite/Best Champions: Lucian, Caitlyn, Sivir, Ezreal. Can play all ADC's but Kalista/Jhin. Although I'm learning them 

I play everyday and for the next week+ my schedule is very easily changeable for teams. I'm very dedicated, focused and passionate. 
Also I'm from New Zealand if that makes a difference
